backend/main.mo: Motoko backend actor providing user profiles, product CRUD, and order request handling with access‑controlled admin and user permissions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking the footer contact‑links change to its source file and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining light/dark OKLCH color variables and applying background/foreground defaults.
frontend/index.html: Root HTML file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes, wraps the app in ThemeProvider, and renders layout, pages, and the toaster.
frontend/src/components/AccessDeniedScre: Reusable screen showing an access‑denied message with a link back to the shop.
frontend/src/components/AddToOrderContro: Quantity selector and add/update/remove controls for adding products to the order draft with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderReque: Admin panel listing order requests with status updates, deletion, and loading states.
frontend/src/components/admin/OrderStatu: Dropdown for selecting and displaying order status options.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductAdm: Admin interface for listing, creating, editing, deleting, and toggling stock of products.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductEdi: Dialog component for creating or editing products with form state, validation, and React Query mutations.
frontend/src/components/AdminRoute.tsx: Admin‑only route guard that checks login and admin status, showing loaders or access‑denied screens as needed.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer with email and Instagram contact links plus branding and caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with logo, navigation, cart count, login button, and responsive mobile menu using auth and order draft state.
frontend/src/components/Layout.tsx: Layout component rendering header, footer, and routed page content.
frontend/src/components/LoginButton.tsx: Login/logout button handling Internet Identity authentication with loading and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/ProductCard.tsx: Displays product image, details, price, stock badge, and add-to-order controls.
frontend/src/components/ProductDiscovery: Search and scent filter bar with clear functionality for product discovery.
frontend/src/components/ProductImage.tsx: Product image component with fallback placeholder and error handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Dialog prompting new authenticated users to enter and save their profile name.
frontend/src/config/payment.ts: Exports the store’s merchant UPI ID used for payment processing.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s Internet Identity, with automatic refetching when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorState.ts: Wraps useActor to provide derived loading, ready, and error states for UI handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminProducts.ts: Provides mutations for creating, updating, deleting, and toggling stock of products via the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Hooks for fetching, saving, and checking admin status of the caller’s user profile.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, including login, logout, and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderDraft.ts: Manages a persistent local order draft with products and quantities, including add, update, remove, and clear.
frontend/src/hooks/useOrderRequests.ts: Hooks for submitting, retrieving, deleting, and updating order requests with price normalization and actor state handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useProduct.ts: Fetches a single product by ID and normalizes its price.
frontend/src/hooks/useProducts.ts: Fetches all or in‑stock products with caching, retries, and price normalization.
frontend/src/index.css: Sets up Tailwind layers and defines light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Admin dashboard with tabbed views for product management and order requests.
frontend/src/pages/OrderConfirmationPage: Displays order confirmation details and a button to return to the storefront.
frontend/src/pages/OrderRequestPage.tsx: Order submission form handling customer details, items, UPI info, shipping, and actor readiness checks.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Shows product details, image, price, stock status, and options to add to order.
frontend/src/pages/StorefrontCatalogPage: Displays product catalog with search, filtering, hero section, and error handling.
frontend/src/utils/actorErrorMessages.ts: Utility functions converting actor-related errors into user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/currency.ts: Helpers for normalizing, converting, and formatting INR prices in paise.
frontend/src/utils/shipping.ts: Shipping utilities determining fees and free-shipping eligibility based on city.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Helpers to read URL params (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and remove them from the URL when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, animations, and enabling typography, container queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project metadata describing the incense shop app’s goals, architecture notes, known issues, and implemented features.
